text: Miss Earth Ecuador 2018 is the 2nd edition of Miss Earth Ecuador pageant. The election night was held September 29, 2018 in Cuenca where Lessie Giler from Manabí crowned Diana Valdivieso from Manabí as well. The winner represented Ecuador at Miss Earth 2018 pageant. ==Results== ===Placements=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Final results !
